name: Necromatica
description:
Thank you for trying our game!!! :D

Your goal is to make a factory that makes skeletons!

Start by observing how the example factory works and than build your own.

It is up to you how efficient it should be. We couldn't finish a "campaign" mode in time, so you can play this game in any way you want. Yay Sandbox!

Controls:

WSAD - to move the camera

Left Mouse Click - to place a block

Right Mouse Click - to brake a block

Left Click on the block in the bottom menu to select it as a building material

Left Click on the block in the right menu to select it as an action for your machines

IMPORTANT

NO SAVE FEATURE (yet?)

To place a building belt (conveyer) you need to place 2 shafts (bones) and then left click on both of them while selecting a belt.

To power a building, you need to connect it to a shaft (bone) with rotational power

Before placing a Chewer or a Cauldron you need to select a recepie from the right menu, otherwise you will not place a block

More detailed explanation (WITH GIFS) is coming soon. It is 5am in here and we are exhausted. 

Game made by Ehidney, Savure, CakeEater (CakeEaterGames)
